original: 會稽句章人，孫權之后，孫亮之母。據傳乃是絕色美人。孫權重病垂死，潘淑侍疾疲勞，因以患疾，臥床昏睡時，被宮女勒斃，對外聲稱她暴病而亡。
text: Kuaiji Juzhang, after Sun Quan, Sun Liang's mother. Rumored to be a stunning beauty. Sun Quan was seriously ill and was dying, and Pan Shu was sick and tired. She was strangled by the maid of the palace when she was lying in bed due to illness, and claimed that she died of severe illness.
